text: Steel sections match approved shop drawings and specifications
Mill certificates available and reviewed for compliance
Steel stored off ground, with adequate supports and protection from corrosion
Surface finish and coating condition verified (galvanized, primed, etc.)

id: B. Base Plate and Anchor Bolt Installation

text: Anchor bolts placed as per layout and properly embedded
Grouting under base plates complete and cured prior to steel erection
Leveling and shim packing under plates checked
Members erected as per erection drawings with correct orientation and alignment
Bolt grade, type, and size verified per drawings/specs
Bolted connections torqued or tensioned per spec
Welded connections per approved WPS (Welding Procedure Specification)
Weld inspection completed by certified personnel (CWB or equivalent)
Fireproofing or intumescent paint installed if required
Vertical and horizontal alignment checked with total station or levels
Temporary bracing installed during erection to ensure stability

id: • CSA S16 – Design of Steel Structures
• CISC Code of Standard Practice for Structural Steel
• AWS D1.1 / CSA W59 – Welding Standards
